name: Snip It! (itch)
description:
Dual wield your loyal garden shears as you protect your precious greenhouse from overgrowth of uncontrollable plants!

The goal is to get as much score as possible by harvesting the fruits of various plants when they get ripe. Be fast because, if not cut, the fruits will go rotten over time. The greenhouse can withstand up to 10 rotten fruits at the time, resulting in game over if reached.

Game offers easier and harder modes, as well as stress-free mode.

Controls:

  • W S A D -- move around
  • Space -- jump
  • Shift -- hold to sprint
  • LMB -- use the shears (on plants)

Controls can be remapped in settings.

This game was made for Godot Wild Jam #36. The theme was "Uncontrollable Growth".

Design and code by Karlo Koščal (Winged).
Design and 3D modeling by Karlo Mačukatić (Machu).
